document_data.name: ''Necklace of Confidence''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''necklace of confidence''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[amulet]] that boosted the wearer's self-esteem.
document_data.Description: The ''necklace of confidence'' featured single [[gemstone]] that blazed with searing bright shimmer.
document_data.Powers: Apart from magically boosting the wearer's self-esteem, the amulet also improved their will and defenses against magics that affected one's resolve and strength of determination.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''necklace of confidence'' could be found within a dried up well of magic water in the [[Elven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]]. The amulet was thrown in there at some point before or during the fall of [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[Weeping War]]. Later, the room with he well became haunted by bloodthirstily master [[wight]] and its four undead servants.
